page.title: 17HORSE RIDING
page.content: IN OUR CLASS,THREE PEOPLE GO RIDING. I USUALLY GO RIDING WITH A FRIEND. MY PONY IS CALLED "DOUGAL". IF YOU OWN A PONY THIS IS WHAT YOU NEED. FIRSTLY QUITE A BIG{FIELD}AND A {STABLE}FOR THE WINTER. YOU SHOULD ALSO HAVE A{HALTER,}A{BRIDLE}AND A{SADDLE. THIS IS CALLED YOUR TACK. IN ADDITION YOU WILL NEED SOME {SADDLE SOAP,}SOME {SADDLE OIL,}SOME {HOOF OIL}AND BRUSHES LIKE A{DANDY BRUSH}FOR THEIR TAILS,A {BODY BRUSH}FOR THEIR COAT AND A{COMB FOR THEIR MANES. IN THE SUMMER KEEPING A PONY COSTS VIRTUALLY NOTHING BECAUSE THE PONY CAN EAT GRASS. IN THE WINTER IT COSTS QUITE A LOT BECAUSE HAY IS Â£1.25 A BALE AND THE STRAW COSTS ABOUT THE SAME. IF YOUR PONY NEEDS A VET IT CAN BE VERY EXPENSIVE. CARING FOR YOUR PONY CAN BE QUITE A RESPONSIBILITY BUT IT IS A VERY WORTHWHILE HOBBY.
